title: Someone filmed Prince Harry fixing Meghan Markle's ponytail before she posed for a photo during their royal tour
text:
Prince Harry was filmed fixing Meghan Markle's hair for her as she posed for a photo on Monday.

Captured by a fan account on Instagram, the video shows Harry adjusting his wife's ponytail after noticing it was tucked into her dress.

Markle seemed oblivious to the sweet moment as she stood for the camera.

The pair are currently embarking on a 10-day royal tour of Africa with baby Archie.

Visit Insider's homepage for more stories.

Prince Harry has raised the bar for husbands everywhere, after he was filmed fixing Meghan Markle's hair during a royal engagement on Monday.

The Duke and Duchess of Sussex were taking pictures with fans in Cape Town, the first stop in their 10-day tour of Africa, when the adorable moment happened.

Read more: Here's how Meghan Markle and Prince Harry's first family royal tour is different to Prince William and Kate Middleton's

Markle was unaware that her ponytail was tucked into her dress — and, without her even noticing, Harry swooped in to save the day.

Watch the sweet moment in the video below, captured by a fan account on Instagram.

Fans of the couple will know it's not the first time Harry has done something like this. Another video shows the prince smoothing down Markle's hair from the wind during her charity cookbook launch last year.

The duke and duchess have been nothing short of adorable during their tour, with plenty of PDA-filled moments after just three days of their working visit.

Meghan Markle and Prince Harry holding hands in Cape Town, South Africa. Chris Jackson/ Getty Images

A highlight of the trip so far has to be baby Archie's first appearance.

This was the four month old's first official engagement since the photo call to celebrate his birth in May. On Wednesday, however, Harry and Markle released a video of the youngster as he joined them to meet Archbishop Desmond Tutu.

The little one even appears to have red hair like his father.

On Thursday, Harry will depart for solo engagements in Botswana, Angola, and Malawi, and the family will reunite on Wednesday for their last day of tour.
